description: From cool mountain trails to urban commutes and mad dashes to catch a flight, they designed the all-new Men’s Baja Pant to cover all your bases whether you’re close to home or somewhere very far from it. Made with durable and weather-resistant, four-way stretch fabric that features a looped, twill backer for premium, next-to-skin softness, the Baja’s sleek, movement-focused fit provides form and function in equal doses. A concealed, side seam zip pocket stashes your passport or other valuables, and the recycled polyester and Spandex waistband offers a smooth, next-to-skin fit under a climbing harness or backpack hip belt.
name: Cotopaxi Baja Pants - Mens
